text: Larry Hankin (born December 7, 1937) is an American movie, television, radio, stage, and voice actor. He is best known for his role as Mr. Heckles in Friends. Hankin was born in New York City, New York.Biography for Larry Hankin - IMDb He studied at Syracuse University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * YouTube page Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Movie producers from New York (state)
title: Larry Hankin
